Pick from a variety of categories to satisfy your niches! You can pick from adjectives, animals, common words, countries, nature, or space(four more with an in-app purchase bundle!)! 

How Do I Play?

Hoho I’m so glad you asked!! Here’s how it works: tap the mixed up letters on the screen in the right order to form the hidden word! Each letter is worth 20 points and each hint you use will cost you 20 points, so try not to use them! The first word you get will give you 30 seconds to solve it and for every consecutive word solved, the timer will start out 2 seconds shorter down to a minimum of 4 seconds(You really got to be quick!).

Why Play?

Whether it’s because you don’t have Wi-Fi and you need a cool game on a long car ride or you feel you want to touch up on your spelling and knowledge of the English language, Unscramble Jumble has it all! 

In App Purchase:

Es liegt ganz bei dir.

Während der Geschichte stehen dir Antworten zur verfügung. 
Je nach Antwort werden dir mehr oder weniger Liebe erteilt.
Die Endings der Stories setzen eine gewisse Punktzahl voraus, um sie lesen zu können.


◆Zwei Brüder wie Sonne und Mond◆

Masashi
Um das Erbe zu behalten, muss er dich heiraten.
Er hegt immer noch einen Groll auf dich, aber warum nur?
Deine große Liebe....Scheinhochzeit
Du bist gefangen zwischen 2 Entscheidungen
"Jetzt bist du meine Frau...für ein Jahr"

Ryouya
Er schreitet blind und ziellos durchs Leben. Nimmt alles auf die leichte Schulter.
Deshalb braucht er Geld, das Erbe...er will euch auseinander bringen.
Ist das wirklich der einzige Grund?

◆ Story 1+2 sind jetzt verfügbar - aber es kommen noch viel mehr!!!
Masashi, Ryouya ...Sie sind Brüder, aber so gegensätzlich.
Tauche ein in eine Welt, die dich gefangen halten wird. 

Veröffentliche Stories
-Masashis 1st Story
-Masashis 2nd Story

Bald verfügbar
Ryouyas 1st Story
und noch viele mehr

Without your sight you find yourself listening to the echos to explore the darkness. 
You won't be alone. You will need to run. You will need to hide. You will need to survive and find your way out.

This game uses echolocation - use sound waves and echoes to determine where objects are in the darkness. This is your tool to map out your surroundings.

This game will need a steady hand. You will navigate through the darkness with your device's motion.

Make sure your sound is on and use your headphones. 

Good luck.

Welcome to UNSOLVED - the ultimate FREE hidden object adventure experience viewed through detective eyes in the extraordinary world of mystery games, puzzling investigations, and tons of hidden clues waiting to be found.A NEW DAWN OF HIDDEN OBJECT MULTIVERSEJump right into a new world of hidden object puzzle adventure games with this collection of carefully crafted, highly praised FREE hidden object marvels, ALL IN ONE PLACE. Play more mystery games without leaving the application and look forward to new titles in this evergrowing set.PLETHORA OF STORIESEmbark on a thrilling adventure in a multitude of breathtaking lands and immerse yourself in compelling tales filled with fascinating characters, both friendly and hostile. Unravel chilling stories of unexplained vanishing, mystery murder or a dark family secret. Is it a vicious crime or a supernatural event? Whatever the case, you will be captivated from the beginning to the end.DETECTIVE WORKBecome a true detective and run a thorough investigation. Lead the inquiry, document evidence, and solve an abundance of exceptional puzzles. Use your deductive skills to get inside the minds of your adversaries. Connect the dots and solve the mystery conundrum. Whether it is a criminal case, a secret society conspiracy or unsolved mysteries of the past, discover the truth and don’t let the persecutors escape.HIDDEN OBJECTS GALOREExplore a vast number of mesmerizing sights in search of clues and practical appliances to advance your investigations. Challenge your perceptivity by scouring through plenty of heavily detailed, beautifully illustrated scenes filled with heaps of hidden objects. Find them all on a crime scene, in a haunted hotel, an enchanted forest and dozens of other unique places.ENTHRALLING VENUESVisit diverse, captivating settings in this expanding set of mystery games. Your journey will take you from mystery manor to dark city alley, from hidden hotel to dim dungeon. Anticipate new astonishing areas in the upcoming UNSOLVED in-app releases.AT THE FLOW OF THE TIDEUNSOLVED presents the remarkable EVENTIDE trilogy, including an exclusive bonus chapter, as the starting point for this new Hidden Object Adventure Games Collection from the creators of genre-defining mystery classics: ENIGMATIS and GRIM LEGENDS series.Start your journey in the magnificent world of Eventide. Join Mary Gilbert in her travel to eastern Europe and delve into stirring Slavic folklore only to encounter an unearthly threat. Discover Mary’s heritage and help her overcome the dangers she was destined to face.BRING ALL THE GAMES WITH YOUOptimized for phones and tablets, filled with hidden objects, perfect for playing while traveling.KEY FEATURESEnjoy an evergrowing collection of skillfully crafted FREE hidden object puzzle adventure gamesRun detective investigations, solve criminal cases or discover ancient mysteriesChallenge your mind in exceptional puzzlesFind tons of hidden objects in complex scenesEscape into a world of unforgettable mystery storiesBe amazed by beautiful hand-painted sceneriesGet thirsty for more adventures to come!NOT CONVINCED YET?Have a look at some of the reviews of our existing hidden object adventure games:NOIR CHRONICLES: CITY OF CRIME“Love this game! Artifex Mundi is truly awesome! Thank you!”CRIME SECRETS: CRIMSON LILY“Love it Artifex Mundi delivers again!!!!”THE MYTH SEEKERS: THE LEGACY OF VULCAN“Outstanding as always! They make awesome games. Never disappoint.”GRIM LEGENDS: THE DARK CITY"Fantastic game, good storyline. Entertaining with beautiful graphics especially the CGI clips. Keep 'em coming guys."

column6: Unspeakable™ is the FREE word game your friends are playing everywhere! Great for bars, parties, gatherings, family trips and everything in between.Can you and your team guess a SECRET word without saying any of the UNSPEAKABLE words? Be aware of the timer, score the most points and WIN!

Can you guess BANANA by hearing its description without the words FRUIT or YELLOW?
How to play: Describe the word without using the words below the line.

For those that like the original Taboo game, will find Unspeakable games a ton of fun.
Unspeakable Talk is the new social guessing game extending the Unspeakable game series.
Hear a funny VOICE-CLUE recording and guess the word described - Record a VOICE-CLUE and see if they can guess the secret word based on your description.

Do you LIKE SWIPING on your mobile devices? TEST YOUR SWIPING SKILLS with UNSTABALL! You're gonna LOVE SWIPING!!!
Unstaball is a simple, easy to play and exciting physics-based game that challenges your swiping skills. To play you touch and swipe on a (blue) ball in order to put it inside a ring. That's it!

Depending on your skills, you may complete all the levels in less than 5 minutes.

• Physics-based environment
• Game Center (Leaderboards to compete with other players, Achievements to challenge friends)

• Put the BLUE BALL inside the ring before the TIMER EXPIRES.

• Use headphones for a better gaming experience.
• Play in low light conditions for best visual experience. You'll be delighted by the colourful effects

column5: Throw knives but do not hit!
column6:
UnStabbed - Knife Circus is the most lively addictive shooting game! This game will let you think ahead before you make any shoot while playing.

The goal of this addictive shooting game is to throw knives, axes and other weapons without hitting the target with any weapon. But, keep in mind that you should be very precise in this free endless archery game because the wheel keeps turning faster and faster and it may change its direction sometimes and you should not hit the target or you will lose. Sounds easy? But, would you be able to score the highest possible score in this addictive shooter game without mistakes? 

This new shooter game is amazingly designed with an awesome environment to give you the best experience while playing. As a player, your task is to concentrate and maintain your focus so that you can make as many shots as you can without hitting the target to score the highest possible score. 

And when you make it to the top of the leaderboards, don’t forget to share video of your last moments to your friends with built in recorder

Why choose to play UnStabbed - Knife Circus on your smartphone or tablet instead of other archery games?

= Nice =   

- We made some 3D Cool and smooth high-quality graphics to give you the best experience while playing the greatest shooting game ever! You will enjoy it!  

- With our realistic graphics, you will have the feeling of shooting real knives and weapons and not playing a shooting game.   

- Share last moments of your game play to your friends via instant messaging apps or email
 
= Easy =   

- We care about you and that's why we made our archery game very easy to play, so all that you have to do is to tap the screen to launch the weapon. Super easy!   

= Free =   

- Our archery game is FREE and it will stay Free for life, so there are No hidden fees or annual subscription to enjoy one of the most addictive game ever!   

= Gift Boxes =   

- The best thing is that you can collect new weapons, wheels, and targets from the gift boxes. You can get 5 targets, 10 weapons, and 16 wheel backgrounds. We will keep adding more regularly.

= Endless =   

- Yes! our game is endless and you can enjoy playing as much as you want because the only one who can stop you is you.

= For everyone =

- UnStabbed - Knife Circus is a free game and it can be played by Adults and Teens. Your whole family can play it and they will enjoy playing it for hours nonstop!

What are you waiting for? Download UnStabbed - Knife Circus and enjoy the best free archery game ever!

A secretive facility has hired you to test out their strange devices. Solve intricate puzzles to earn their trust and uncover the secrets of this place!

This is the Extended Edition of the popular online game 'Unstable Engineer', now with new puzzles and new mysteries. A 1-man production.

Guide robotic devices called 'Blueprints' towards the exit in each level, working around various obstacles, and taking advantage of each Blueprint's unique skills. Progress through different game modes, including some reminiscent of the classic 'Lemmings' series to other innovative challenges. And all the while, get to know your secretive co-workers, to earn their trust and learn more of the mysteries of this strange facility.

• Optional hints for each level  
• No ads or in-app purchases!  
• 4 quirky characters to get to know in your down-time between puzzles  
• Various secret experiments to unlock, if you can!

An understanding of the English language is required to fully enjoy this game.

Get ready to experience a revolutionary defense game that will send you spinning. 

Gamespot says, "...an entertaining tribute to the alien-invasion movies of days gone by and an enjoyable tower defense game that requires you to think on your feet."

Destructoid says, "Unstoppable Gorg is a blast...you'll find yourself coming back time and time again."

Rock, Paper, Shotgun says, "There’s lots to like about Unstoppable Gorg, and not just the neat presentation and excellent production: the actual tower defence model is clever too." 

Unstoppable Gorg challenges you to defend the solar system from fearsome aliens by sending satellites into orbit. Unlike tower-based defense games, in Unstoppable Gorg you can move your satellites by rotating the orbits that surround planets, moons and space stations. 

Unstoppable Gorg is a lovingly crafted homage to vintage sci-fi movies from the 1950s. Flying saucers, rubbery aliens, dodgy effects, it's got them all. The game's story scenes were shot on film using models, miniatures and actors and then edited together with genuine archive footage to create a classic sci-fi experience that is out of this world.

► Take on the Gorg in more than 40 challenging levels of revolutionary defense action.

► Satellites in orbit replace the towers and grid layout used in other defense games.

► Move your satellites around their orbits to create the best defense for each wave.

► Experience a thrilling story inspired by the classic sci-fi movies of the 1950s.

► Glorious 3D graphics and effects for added impact.


Players with a MacBook Pro with Retina display should enable Low Resolution mode for improved compatibility. See http://support.apple.com/kb/ht5266 for details.

Unstoppable Gorg is 100 percent free. There are NO in-app purchases, micro-transactions or hidden costs. There are no gems, coins or hearts to buy and we will NEVER ask you to spend money to enjoy the complete game. 

So what are you waiting for? Earth needs heroes to stop the Gorg!

column6:
Rev your engines and sharpen your circular saws!

Unstoppable is a furious post-apocalyptic truck racing game where your goal is to survive an explosive highway of mad raiders hell-bent on your destruction. Weapons at your disposal include machine guns, mounted spikes, circular saws, flamethrowers, miniguns and minions to turn your truck into an explosive death machine!

Features:


* A fully upgradeable big truck – boost your weapons, speed, fuel, armor and more to conquer the highway! 
* Unlock an insane number of weapons to bolt onto your truck: spikes, shotguns, flamethrowers, grenade launchers, mounted circular saws, a magnet gun and much much more!
* No highway ever the same. A procedurally generated highway and mad enemies will keep you truck racing for hours.

* Explosive difficulty with raiders who'll ram, bash and shoot you with all kinds of weapons.
* Cash for damage - cause as much furious destruction as you can to be able to afford the baddest weapons.
* No ads!
* No in-app purchases!
* Just explosive highway truck racing.

Device Support:

Unstoppable is TOO HARDCORE for older devices, as such we recommend purchasing on iPhone 5s, iPad Mini 2 and iPad Air or newer. While the game might run on the iPhone 4s, iPhone 5 or the iPad Retina (2012) and below, we don't officially support these devices.


      more

When the past meets the present, it's up to three intrepid young archaeologists to unearth the truth!Unsung Heroes is a brand new time management game from GameHouse. It follows the path of three passionate archaeologists, determined to uncover history! In Unsung Heroes - The Golden Mask, the three girls are excavating in China. They stumble upon the story of Xi Niu, a Chinese girl who lived over a thousand years ago. You will switch back and forth between modern day and ancient China as you restore artifacts and slowly start to fill in the story behind them.Play first as adventurous Ivy, brainy Stephanie and powerhouse Diana as they search for lost treasure. Then go into the past and play as brave Xi Niu, a girl determined to find justice for her family!As a young girl, Xi Niu watched as her parents were brutally murdered by a man wearing a golden mask. She vows revenge, somehow, some way... 10 years later, she is unexpectedly offered a position as a courtesan in the palace. She seizes the opportunity, as it offers a way to locate the man in the golden mask.But life is not simple in the palace. It is a snake pit of intrigue and politics and one misstep can mean death. Xi Niu will need to learn how to play the game to survive. Can this girl from the country navigate the dangerous waters of the palace to exact her revenge?Help the three girl s find the pieces of this puzzle and piece together the story of the brave Xi Niu!- Play in both the present and the past!- Find fragments of long-lost artifacts- Unlock the story as you complete each artifact with a special mini game- Unearth an ancient culture- Learn about artifacts based on real findings!- Master 14 exciting mini games - 7 in the present and 7 in the past- Explore 4 different dig sites, each with 4 unique artifacts to uncover!- Discover 6 exotic locations in the past and help Xi Niu find her way- Find and restore 16 main artifacts and an additional 40 optional artifacts- Enjoy a delightful new time management story game by GameHouse!Try the first few levels for free! Then choose to unlock the full game with an in-app purchase, or subscribe for a free trial of our subscription plan!*NEW!* Enjoy all GameHouse Original Stories with a subscription! As long as you’re a member, you can play all of your favorite story games. Relive past stories and fall in love with new ones. It’s all possible with a GameHouse Original Stories subscription. Subscribe today!More about GameHouse Original Stories subscriptions:- You can subscribe to play this game and all other GameHouse Original Stories games without Ads.- GameHouse Original Stories offers a choice of one subscription: monthly- Monthly subscriptions will be charged at $9.99/month*- You will be able to access unlimited stories for the duration of your subscription- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase- Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period- Account will be charged for renewal up to 24 hours prior to the end of the current period- Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable* Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent subscription price in $USDBy using GameHouse Original Stories, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.Terms of Service: https://www.gamehouseoriginalstories.com/static/terms-of-service.htmlPrivacy Policy: https://www.gamehouseoriginalstories.com/static/privacy-policy.html

★★★ Untangle Space Out has achieved US Top 100 ranking on iTunes. Also ranked in top 50 in multiple countries in Europe & Asia! ★★★★"Untangle Space Out’s a great genre of puzzle and logic gaming: the gameplay is intuitive to understand, the style can be adapted to any setting and it’s full of untangle-type puzzles. And when I say full, I mean full.” - FreshApps★"Untangle Space Out is one of the more interesting puzzle games that I’ve seen in a while on the iPhone" - Jason Lee, Nine Over Ten★"You’d probably never play the same thing twice in Arcade, and that’s really cool."- Jason Lee, Nine Over Ten★“The music in the game is well-done and very atmospheric.” - Fresh AppsThe makers of the top ranked 'Slot Machine' present "Untangle Space Out" - an extremely competitive galactic untangle puzzle for the whole family. Move the orbs around to untangle overlapping neon rays and solve the puzzle. Plan your moves, challenge yourself to think at the speed of light and become an Untangle: SpaceOutonaut!Here's what some of our early reviewers have to say about the game...★ “Good puzzle game that offers a brain teasing challenge!”★ “Difficult and challenging! Just have to play around a little with it to get a hang of it. It’s got great relaxing music!” – The App Show★ “Sleek user interface with some chilled out space-age ambient background music. Highly polished graphics with tranquilizing background music and futuristic sounds. Really impressive for a puzzle game.”Combining beautiful backgrounds, ambient music and superbly thought out game play, Space Out makes every brain-teasing puzzle a challenge to remember! Enhanced game play with infinite variations via 'Blaster' and 'Frozen' orbs. Get access via In App Purchase.Space Out is an intensely challenging puzzle game with unlimited replay value. Compete with other iPhone users for top rankings on the leader board! Brag about your skills on Facebook and Twitter! More varied & challenging than The Plateau, Tangled and other untangle games. Space Out is the final frontier and this is your test! Are you ready?★ TOP FEATURES ★● Two Fantastic Game Modes:    ○ Challenge: 50 games spread over 10 levels of mind-twisting puzzles. Better your high score by replaying unlocked levels    ○ Arcade: Infinite number of puzzles to keep you hooked! Every puzzle is unique and you can play on and on to your heart’s content● Orb variations for enhanced game play    ○ Blaster Orbs: If left uncapped they explode causing major disruption to your game! Or just let it explode and enjoy the resultant fun!    ○ Frozen Orbs: Orbs randomly freeze up preventing you from finishing off the game within time. So be quick to unfreeze them and get additional 'unfreeze bonus'● Bonus Rounds: Surprise bonus rounds to maximize your scores● Leader board: Online global and regional high scores tracked daily, weekly and monthly ● Personal High Scores: Intuitive in-game stats showing your best time and moves. Better your high scores by replaying unlocked levels!● Tangled up? Learn how to solve the puzzle by viewing the solution ● Comprehensive Help● Practice Mode: Learn the ropes before you dive in!● Mesmerizing intuitive graphics● Multiple background scores to suit your mood. You can play your own music as well via the inbuilt iPod control in the settings screenSo, go ahead, download and revel in the challenge of Untangle Space Out.Like our Apps? "Untangle. Rings and Lines" is an exciting puzzle game.

Move the rings to make threads not crossed.

These objects can not be overlapped.

Some rings are fixed - they can not be moved.

Discs can be moved only in their orbits.

Unravel a ball of threads!

Solve with minimum number of moves.

"Solution" button is available without restriction for all tasks.

"Untangle Rings and Lines" is a classic puzzle game which will help you to enjoy time.

All the tasks are divided into 5 groups according to the number of nodes (6-7, 8-9, 10-14, 15-19, 20-30).
There are 5 categories of complexity in each group.
Each category has 400 levels.

There are total (5x5x400) = 10000 tasks.

Until Dead - Think to Survive is a potent genre mashup, mixing styles and challenges of a turn-based tactical game, puzzle game, stealth game, and survival. In this one man war against the impossible odds you will have to give it your best if you want to survive. The zombie horde is waiting for a single mistake and survival will require careful thought and consideration.

In each level you will control a single survivor, making your moves one tile at a time. Every move counts and a single mistake can be fatal, so take your time to come up with the best solution. The stakes will keep on rising from level to level, and only by mastering all of the game’s mechanics, items and special powers you will be able to overcome all obstacles.

The unique Noire art style brings the game world to life and creates a dark atmosphere of constant danger. Until Dead - Think to Survive will immerse you in its world and its dangers. It is up to you to survive in it!

NOTICE: Play the beginning for free. A one-time in-app purchase unlocks the full game.UNTOLD is an immersive text-based RPG where you create your own adventure. You wake up on a beach, confused and vengeful and soon encounter a nomad. Like you, she suffers from memory loss and wishes nothing but vengeance upon those responsible.”Even in its early stage, it is a delightful game – the eloquent writing, amount of surprise elements and uncertainty paint a wonderful experience unique to every play-through!” – PlayerChoose your own UNTOLD story by making decisions that impact your adventure. Some of these choices will pave way for survival, others will condemn you to the realm of the dead. As you venture through the world, you gain experience, gather equipment and build your character. Keep in mind though, that strength is not everything you need to survive the cruel continent that is Tem Khiris.You play as an undefined character, without any knowledge of gender or looks. Without memories of your past, you have but one desire - vengeance. Uncertainty shrouds your UNTOLD story and it is up to you to crawl out of it alive. The world of Tem Khiris is rifled with conflict and war. Warlords, druids and cults antagonize each other for the authoritarian upper hand. Can you make your way out?- Nostalgic table-top RPG style- Text-based game story RPG- Equip and build your character- Over 8 hours of playtime (Estimated, single play-through)- Multiple endings- Re-playability with different play styles opening up different locations, gear and itemsChoose wisely, your choices matter!Untold is currently only available in English.The game is free to try up to a certain point in the story where you will be offered the option to unlock the full game in order to continue.Supports VoiceOver

Hit the beach and join the UNU card party!  It’s the Crazy 8 card game preferred by ONO Players. UNU is the perfect combination of some your favorite classic card games like Spite & Malice, Dutch Blitz and Euchre. Even the little ones can join the card party. Playing UNU online is as easy as a Go Fish! Download now and enjoy an unparalleled card game experience in our beach rec room! UNU Features:- Play online multiplayer with thousands of users around the world!- Discover lots of cool maps and themes!- Play in dozens of UNU tournaments.- Intuitive, realistic game play and interface- Play your own music in the background.- All content unlocked. No need to complete a long tutorial or checklist to get a game started. 	Whether it’s spelled UNU, ONO, or ONU, the rules are the same. Just like the classic crazy eights game you play with friends and family, try to be the first to shed all your cards. When it’s your turn, play a card with either the same color or number as the last card played. Once a player has laid their last card, the match is over. Watch out– This high speed card game is crazy eights with a twist! There’s a few special UNU playing cards to look out for: +2 Cards: Get the card war started and attack your opponent with 2 extra playing cards.Skip: Place this one to make your opponent lose their turn. Reverse: Change the direction of the game (from counterclockwise to clockwise or back again)! Wild: These can be played at any time. Lay it down and pick a color. Wild +4: Pick a color and pummel your foe with four extra playing cardsWant to play UNU with friends, but nobody is available? No problem! You can join games with 1000s of players from all over the world in Online Multiplayer mode. Alternatively, kick back and enjoy a game of crazy eights versus computer players. No matter how you play, UNU offers hours of card party fun! UNU is guaranteed to become a favorite in your card game collection. Download the crazy 8 card game now!

About Sudie Rakusin:Sudie Rakusin is an artist, author, publisher and the creator of the Unwind Time coloring app. She creates environments that are lush and surreal, rich with color, texture and pattern. Art is where Sudie goes for refuge, replenishing, and how she pays homage to what sustains her.Sudie wants women to see themselves as she sees them: divine and diverse. Her concept of beauty is vast. Women of all sizes, shapes, colors and ethnicities are represented in her work, sharing her vision for a more inclusive world where women are empowered and respected. The natural world inspires Sudie’s patterns and designs and reflects her deepest desire to protect and preserve our sacred resources. In her art, women and animals walk side by side in mutual love and respect.Sudie published her first blank journal with pen-and-ink drawings in the early ‘80s followed by notecards and coloring books in the ‘90s long before coloring was in vogue. With the increasing dependency on technology, she saw the need to humanize the digital world to save the connection of nature to our creative spirits. She hopes for the Unwind Time app to sustain the artist within everyone, using technology as a vehicle for creativity.In the late ‘80s, Sudie founded Winged Willow Press, a unique paper goods shop to make her art accessible to all through thoughtful reproductions in the form of cards, books, journals, coloring books, and more. To shop for all Winged Willow Press offerings visit www.sudierakusin.com.Find her on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/sudierakusin or follow her at http://twitter.com/SudieRakusin, https://www.tumblr.com/blog/sudierakusin, and https://instagram.com/sudie.rakusin/The Unwind Time App has a diverse collection of original coloring books by artist Sudie Rakusin. These are comprised of complex pen-and-ink drawings reflecting Sudie’s vision for a more harmonious, non-hierarchical world. Sudie created the Unwind Time app to make creativity accessible at everyone’s fingertips. While technology often distracts us from creative pursuits, the Unwind Time App fuses the two together, transforming the screen to a canvas and customizable color palette where your inner artist can shine. With a wide range of brush choices and your palette complete with an opacity scale, you make each drawing your own. In our fast-paced world, Unwind Time gives you the opportunity to slow down and unwind creatively. Enjoy your finished works and share it with friends. *Please Note: Due to the memory requirements of the drawing app, it is recommended for use on iPad 3 (iPad Retina), iPad 4, iPad Air and above models only. All earlier versions do not support Unwind Time.View tutorials at www.unwindtimeapp.com

NOTE: UNYWND is recommended to played on iOS 6 or above. UNWYND will work on properly on iPhone 5c, iPad 3, iPad mini and above.**Apple's Best of 2015 Games**Editor's Choice: iOS**Finalist on the Big Indie Pitch at Pocket Gamer Connects Bangalore 2015!**Finalist on the Game Hack Regional Event at Game Hack India 2015!Inspired by games like Strata and Kami, UNWYND is made with pure intention of offering a very sleek and sharp puzzle experience to the fans of puzzle genre. Most of the mobile games being developed these days cater towards casual audience and there's a lack of content for the hardcore puzzle fans. That's where this zen puzzler comes in. It offers that challenge that's missing from these modern casual games. The game employs a simple swipe based mechanic in order to solve meticulously crafted combo - based puzzles. Instructions:Touch the colored blocks to spawn ribbons horizontally/vertically.These ribbons mark blocks with similar colors in to O's and blocks with different colors in to X's.Complete the objectives on the top by swiping ribbons and strategizing your moves.Reviews:    "when a nicely chilled puzzler like Unwynd comes along, it's always a refreshing change of pace."    - Peter Willington, Pocket Gamer    "There are multiple solutions available for each puzzle, so UNWYND ends up quite relaxing. Without the stress of timer or stars to aim for, it’s fun to decipher things. "    - Jennifer Allen, 148 Apps    "Unwynd proved to be a nice time-killer – if you like using your brain, that is. It’s not an easy game! "    - Mary-Anne Lee, Games In Asia    "This is a great puzzle game for the casual or more advanced fan of brain-teasers, as it makes you think with colors and consider every move you take."    - Jaime Parra, 30plus Gamer    "The gameplay is fresh and enjoyable for the entire family and kids; it gives the brain a small workout to either charge up or cooldown."    - Ajay Verma, IllgamingFeatures: - Simply Swipe the blocks to Solve neat and colorful puzzles- Multiple solutions to each puzzle- Interesting new chaptersMore Info:- Inspired by the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe, UNWYND features some amazing color based puzzles.- Completely new UI and UX to suit the iOS audience.- There is a lot of room for a lot of solutions to a single puzzle with more than 3 level packs.- Gameplay Additions just for the iOS audience.- Gesture based gameplay where we lay down the puzzles and players “paint” their own solutions.-Supported Languages: English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, RussianWant to know more about us? column5: Bid it right, win the fight
column6: The card game of bidding!This game, in which players try to predict the exact number of tricks they will win. The size of the players' hands increases or decreases by one in each deal, and this has given rise to the name Up and Down the River.The object is for each player to bid the number of tricks he/she thinks they can take from each hand, then to take exactly that many; no more and no fewer. Points are awarded for taking tricks with a bonus for matching your bid.Features:   • BRAND NEW scoring options, play the in three different ways       - Classic             > 10 points + tricks taken if you bid right             > tricks taken for underbid             > 0 points for overbid        - Squared             > 10 points + tricks taken squared if you bid right             > 0 points for underbid             > -10 points for overbid        - Zeros             > 10 points + tricks taken if you bid 1 or more and get it right             > 5 points if you bid 0 and get it right             > tricks taken for underbid             > 0 points for overbid   • 5 card back themes (including a whale theme!)   • 2 card front themes   • 5 backgrounds   • change player names   • set maximum number of cards   • tutorial for learning the game

Fly high, fly low.  If you can master that you'll be able to complete 55 levels in this new addictive game with no game over screen.** HOW TO PLAY **TAP and HOLD to fly under floating blocks.RELEASE to fly up and above grounded blocks.Reach the finish line to complete each level.** FEATURES **◉ 55 challenging levels to complete◉ Simple one touch, tap and hold game play◉ Easy to learn, easy to crash◉ No game over screen◉ 3 game modes   - LEVELS (55 of them)   - ENDLESS (how far can you fly?)   - INSANE (like endless mode but super quick!)◉ Awesome soundtrack◉ Leaderboards and AchievementsCan you complete 55 levels and reach the #1 position in the Hall Of Fame Leaderboard with fewest attempts?We hope you enjoy another game made by ENORMACE Games!Twitter: @enormacegames

column1: Up Down Fish - A Free Multiplayer Game for Chromecast to Play with Your Friends
column6: A multiplayer game for your Chromecast!- A note from the developer:Hey Everyone,With this project, we've come to find out the Chromecast isn't designed to run real time games like Up Down Fish.  Please be aware ahead of time that the experience isn't perfect.  We've optimized the game to squeeze every ounce of performance out of the chromecast but we know it's still glitchy.  We've had fun developing this project and still feel it's a fun game to play with your friends.  We hope you can enjoy the game even with it's technical limitations.  As always, thanks for your support and feedback!Sincerely,Beard CocoonHelp your fish swim through the ancient pillars by tapping your device to swim up and down. Work on your high score and bring it with you to other Chromecasts. Compete against your friends or family in this silly multiplayer Chromecast game.• Great party game! • Family friendly!• Up to 10 players at once!Let us know what you think of Up Down Fish by leaving us a review. We're excited to add more features soon, so please let us know what you'd like to see in the next version** This game requires a Chromecast dongle **

column1: Up Hill Limo Off Road Car Rush
column6:
it’s time to drive grand vehicle like Limousine in Hill climb limo off road drive. Get ready, sit behind the wheels and enjoy luxury Limousine car drive in off road environment with Hill Climb Limo off Road Drive. In this game you will enjoy the drive of world’s best vehicle in a scenic 3D environment. Your driving and parking skills will be tested. You must have experienced tourist bus driving but never a limo drive as a driver. Driving this long vehicle in a hilly environment brings a thrill where dangerous roads and sharp turns will wait for you. This 3D simulator is different from other vehicle driving games because you will use your vehicle as  a Taxi.
Seriously? Limousine and Taxi? Yes, you are right. Hill climb limo will offer this chance to you. You will drive your taxi in off-road environment where many passengers are waiting for you. You have to give pick and drop service to tourists in this mountainous region. Passengers will be waiting for on bus station. You have to drive carefully and drop them at their destinations. Providing this transport services as a transporter will bring pleasure in your life. This 3D sim is different in this from other vehicle simulation games.
Driving heavy vehicles is always a difficult task but in off-road environment this difficulty levels increase many folds. So be very careful during this scenic journey. Your duty starts by reaching at bus station, picking up the passenger and drop him safely. This environment will give you feel like driving a 4x4 vehicle. Because, many of us can’t imagine driving a limo in this surrounding, this newest limo driving games that gives you the chance to drive something spectacular in limozin car games! The big challenge in this limo taxi driving 3d is to finish assigned missions in the specific time limit. Test your exceptional driving skills with limo driving 3d simulator in the greatest limozin car games.
Limousine is dream for everyone. Limousine are bigger cars and require superior skills. Tourist Limo hill climbing is full of thrill and adventure to transport tourist passengers to their destination. Pick and drop the tourist from different hill station to their next destination. The gameplay revolves around the mountains, hill tops, water falls, rocks and beautiful nature sights. This game will offer you multiple limo cars to upgrade. You will earn money after each successful level from which you can upgrade your vehicle.

Hill climb limo off road drive Features:
-	Adventurous & Thrilling Limo Driving
-	Realistic limousine Controls
-	Scenic 3D off  road environment
-	Smooth and dynamic game play
-	Pick and drop services to the passengers
-	A complete Hill Station Environment to Explore
-	Transport Tourist to their Destinations Safely
-	Multiple limo cars

The popular Portuguese Up n' Down card game on your iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad and also Mac. With support for up to 4 players, beautiful graphics and smooth animations.

Up n' Down is a game common in Portuguese universities and is a trick-taking game in which the goal is to reach a score of zero - playable in single-player or in multi-player (anonymous or through GameCenter). It is a fun game, with just the correct amount strategy involved to keep you interested and keep you coming back, playing it for hours.

Up n' Down offers many exciting features, including:
- Thoroughly improved multiplayer mode, you can use your Mac, iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad to play with your friends on theirs
- Resume mode (single-player) so that you can always continue from where you left
- Beautiful exclusive made graphics and playing cards for all devices
- Included Up n' Down play rules and game description
- Play using Portuguese or Brazilian rules
- Leader board and an extensive list of achievements
- Your playing statistics

This is it, the Up n' Down game you've been waiting - check it out!

How to play:

The goal is to guess if the next card will be higher or lower than the current card shown. 

1. The player holding the device starts round one, continued by the player to their left. This continues in the circle of players. 

2.  Each round a player guess correct the «Sip Stake» increases by 1. So if a player loses in round 5, they have to take 5 sips.

3. If the current card and the new card is the same value the next player will be skipped.

column6: THIS APP WORKS WITH THE CONNECTED WOODEN TOY SMART NUMBERS.Selected by the AppStore as soon as it came out!Used by teachers in their classes!Children can play with numbers from 0 to 100: - understand the ten- and one-places - find a number in a series of digits - recognize numbers written out - recognize the pronunciation of numbers - manipulate quantities with a set of beadsThis app is designed for children from 4 to 7 years old. It was developed with the assistance of schoolteachers and inspired by the Montessori method.The app is already available in 16 languages!Older children can learn to recognize numbers in a foreign language.EDUCATIONAL GOALSUp to 100 trains children in: - visual and auditory recognition of numbers- the concept of quantity with tens and unitsThe app is inspired by Montessori pedagogy by promoting the acquisition of abstract concepts using concrete manipulation. FOR PARENTSThis app has no advertising. Useful information can be found in a Parents’ Corner. ABOUT MARBOTICUp to 100 is a Marbotic app, a publisher that designs and creates innovative educational solutions blending sensory material and digital interfaces.A wooden toy, Smart Letters, that interacts with tablets can be used to play with the app and stimulate the child’s senses even further! Find our connected toys on our website www.marbotic.com

column6:
Up to 15s provides a fun way to memorize basic math facts from 0 to 15 and the squares and cubes from 0 to 15. 

The player has several options including which operation, which number or numbers, and the "Up To" value (10, 12, or 15).

The game has five difficulty levels for the basic operations: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Expert, and Genius.

The player earns three points for each math challenge completed correctly on the first try, two points for the second try, and one point for the third try. Any attempt to answer the challenge after that will earn zero points. Every math challenge has its own time that is displayed on the statistics screen along with the challenge itself.

A fiendishly difficult jumping game in which you can only jump highest on the upbeats relative to a bass line. The closer you are to the upbeat, the higher your jump.

Tap the screen on the upbeats to make the bird fly and avoid the obstacles. Tap closer (in time) to the bass line for a lower jump.

An upbeat is the opposite of a downbeat. Tap your foot to the music playing. Now clap opposite your foot tapping. You're clapping upbeats. Simple, right? Now you're ready to play.

column5: Math to warm up your brain
column6:
Your brain functions better when it is properly “warmed up”. 

Stepping into an important meeting, about to start an important piece of work or about to study some complicated topic? Warm up your brain for a few minutes and you will function better at the task at hand. 

It can even be useful while playing a sport - say you are in the middle of a set of tennis and finding it difficult to apply the correct strategy - warm up the brain during the break between sets and outthink that opponent! 

UpCharge is a game based on simple mathematics that challenges your mental muscles across a variety of segments – memory, attention, speed, flexibility and problem-solving. The games are quick and simple, but require immense focus to master.  

Up Charge is a brain teaser game on mobile that challenges your mental muscles across a variety of segments – memory, attention, speed, flexibility and problem-solving. The games are quick and simple but requires immense focus to master. 

Based on the neuroscience research which suggests that solving simple math calculations quickly activates most of your brain.  Surprisingly, the task of performing difficult math calculations activates much lesser parts of the brain.  Therefore, now you can UpCharge your brain with simple maths calculation! Put your brain on the fun fire!   

There are two games in UpCharge:

1. AddUp - Here’s a fun game that can get your brain warmed up in under a minute. You can also release your work stress & challenge yourself or others. It’s very simple. 
Add up the two adjacent numbers on the top row and write their sum in the next row below, in the space between them. If the sum is a double-digit number then will write only the last digit. Continue in this way & complete the row. Then go to the next row

2. MindSprint- It helps to develop new approaches for quickly finding answers to calculations in a competent way. Sounds easy? 

How to play -

Tap the blocks that add up to the given number on the screen. The more number of blocks you can use up for getting the sum of the number the more you score.

Install now and enjoy a 3,000 UPX sign up bonus!!!Built at the intersection of the real and virtual world, Upland gives you the power to buy, sell and trade virtual properties based on real-world addresses, just like the one you live at today… but in the virtual world. The digital properties you collect in Upland don’t have any association or rights to the correlating properties in the real world, however, the addresses do mirror real-life locations. Upland’s economy is powered by an in-game currency called UPX (pronounced “UP-EX”).Once you own a property in Upland, you can start to collect UPX earnings on it every 3 hours. Pretty nifty, right?Complete property collections in order to boost your UPX earnings and win one-time UPX award.Trade your properties with other Uplanders in the marketplace - for UPX of for other properties in order to grow your property portfolio and UPX earnings!Have you spotted a property that you want which is already owned by someone else? column6:
Det börjar så oskyldigt. En lek med elden på skoltoaletten. En fjuttig tändsticka i papperskorgen bara. Knappt något papper i den ens. 

14 sekunder senare står du och dina kompisar där, när elden sprutar upp ur papperskorgen som ett vulkanutbrott på Nocco. Ni springer. Shit, vad ni springer. Jympa-läraren skulle vara sjukt impad över hur snabbt ni plötsligt kan springa. 

Några som inte är så impade, däremot, det är alla andra på skolan. När de står ute på skolgården och ser hela byggnaden brinna ner. 

Och ni som bara skulle elda lite.  

Upp i Rök är det lättsamma och charmiga mobilspelet som låter dig spela elden, mitt under en pågående skolbrand. Elden vill hinna så långt som möjligt. 

Ditt mål är att styra elden genom skolans korridorer, klassrum, bibliotek, kemilabb och gymnastiksal. Objekt du slår i tar eld, vilket är spektakulärt men också saktar ner dig. För mycket av det goda gör att du stannar upp helt och omgången är över. 

Sträckan du hinner åka med elden översätts i reparationskostnader.

Bakom mobilspelet “Upp i Rök” står Brandskyddsföreningen. Det har utvecklats som ett underhållande och samtidigt lärande inslag i deras kontinuerliga arbete ute på svenska skolor, där de informerar om riskerna och konsekvenserna kring eldning. Vad som börjar litet och oskyldigt kan sluta i enorm förstörelse och oerhörda ekonomiska konsekvenser. Den primära uppgiften för mobilspelet är att informera om det här utan att måla ungdomar på näsan. 

Upp i Rök har utvecklats av prisbelönta spelstudion Hello There Games i Göteborg. 


      more

DESCRIPTION

You are taps away from owning a super fun and addictive adventure game.
Upperland is an epic platform game full of incredible characters, fantastic landscapes to explore, and stacks of surprises!
Help two tiny creatures who are pulled into a city with skyscrapers, clocks, dangerous factories and terrifying amusement parks avoid all the obstacles and reunite with the family.   
Customize your creatures by buying super cool and cute headbands, wings, glasses, etc to match your style. Take photos of your stylish creatures and share the fun with friends instantly. Keep your eyes peeled: there are many surprises waiting for you!
 
STORY
Two kids of “tiny creatures” have been kidnapped by an evil spider and are being taken farther and farther away! Join the family on an amazing adventure across multiple settings and dozens of challenging stages. Reunite the lost family and discover new worlds to explore by following an evil spider!
FEATURES
- Eye-popping graphics!
- Epic platform action!
- Simple tap control designed to work perfectly with your touch screen!
- Lots of stages over multiple worlds!
- Hundreds of obstacles!
- Bonus levels!
- Hilarious & funky items for characters!
- Mesmerizing music
- Regular free updates!

A BIT MORE…
Upperland is a perfect choice for those who love games that have stories behind them; it is not often that such a simple game actually makes you feel compassionate towards the game characters. 
Upperland has something to offer to everyone; whatever your theme is  you can definitely find something relevant in this game: endless tricky traps, various mechanical obstacles and diverse locations full of crazy puzzles through all levels of this addictive adventure game. As you advance through the stages, the levels get tougher and the obstacles harder to avoid; they even start moving, rotating and disappearing. Reunite the tiny creatures’ family! Just remember that every object can harm your little creatures.
Starting from the deep deep sewerage with dirty pipes and vents, you will move on to crawling skyscrapers and clock tower and later rush through the horror show of the amusement park; Once you survive the appearing ghosts and scary butchers, you will be excited to enter the elevator full of wires sticking out of broken boxes; then fly through the scientific lab with robot-hands that release fire, syringes and explosive chemical poisonous particles that are scattered all around. There also are different factories, but don’t get too excited, remember, you have to dodge all the saws, wood and metal pieces, and many more objects. Next on, you have to fly through dazzling forests, where while everything is charming to the eye, you’d rather not touch anything. And finally, what’s the better way to end the unforgettable adventure than to explore the rocket, the absence of gravity can puzzle you even more as random object and laser beams appear everywhere! 

Why It’s Great
When playing Upperland getting bored is not an option with a constant change of obstacles and surroundings. It is simple and challenging, fast paced and fulfilling, addictive, but easy to pause… The gameplay is completely unpredictable with more and more additions appearing in every single level. Equally great for both, expert gamers and beginners, Upperland can be played for hours!

WARNING: Due to heavy graphics requirements, The Upperland is only compatible with the iPhone 4S & upwards, and iPod Touch 5th Generation - it is NOT compatible with the older iPhone 4 or iPod 4th Generation.


      more

UPPY! - 'DON'T LET ANYTHING BURST YOUR BUBBLE!' A never ending, spectacular and colourful underwater adventure - avoid (whilst you collect coins and gems) a myriad of fish, rocks and assorted critters plus all sorts of surprising creatures you didn't know could float, with looks and sounds that will make you laugh out loud.

PLAYING TIP: KEEP your finger on the screen and slide LEFT or RIGHT (not up or down) to move Uppy and avoid obstacles.

A FUN family orientated game that all ages will enjoy, from kids to moms and dads to grandparents. Truly random play means no two tries will ever be the same. Will your next attempt be an easier one that helps you smash your previous high score? Will you be having “just one more go?”

- Janet: "Love the colors, the fish, all the characters, its so wonderful and vibrant."

- Jack: "Best looking game I've seen in a long time."

- Kevin: "OK another go. AGAIN! Almost beat my high score."

Get coins and multi-valued gems to boost your coin totals and use vital seconds of 'NINJABILITY' to become invincible and push past enemies.

Challenge your friends and family to beat your HIGHEST SCORE. How high can you go before something bursts your bubble?

Choose from a range of 10 different sized cute and cheeky characters - will you be the dog? The cat? The owl? The penguin? Or something else? 

HINT: The smaller the character the easier it is to navigate and avoid your bubble being burst ;-)

So what are you waiting for? Get Uppy! and join in the fun with your family and friends.

REMEMBER:

OVERVIEWUPRISE is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in 3D inspired by the Rubik’s Cube. Lots of mind twisting challenges, a thrilling narrative and a mysterious soundtrack.The game is a student showcase developed and optimized specifically for the Nexus 9 tablet.STORYWhen Vega, a second generation Hybrid, receives a message from her father informing her that he has been captured and the Hybrid rebellion has failed she decides to take action. Though her father has urged her to stay in hiding she launches a one-woman mission to infiltrate the Hybrid prisons, free her species, find her father and overthrow the empire.FEATURES* Get to the top of a vertical prison * Manipulate the building to create your paths * Jump through teleporters * Hack force fields with your robot sidekick* Save the captured Hybrids* Sneak past patrolling enemiesIMPORTANT CUSTOMER INFORMATIONLaser Buddies was founded under the 2015 productions of the Danish National Academy of Digital Interactive Entertainment (DADIU), during which this product was created. As such UPRISE represents a showcase of our vision for a full game experience. The game is 100% free, as is the extra content within, and the option to make in-app purchases is made via a mock-up store that will not withdraw any money. Furthermore, the game includes direct links to social networking sites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. These links can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.Enjoy our game/ Laser Buddies

UpTris Balloons is suggested by classic and evergreen puzzle games, but it has different details which make it more amusing. You still start from level 1, which is really very easy, then, as you go on with strokes, difficulty level will go up and it will be very hard to reach the last level! If you get there, be sure that you will not hold fast for a long time.

Game rules are very simple: you need to make groups of at least 3 balloons having the same colour to make strokes and gain game space. You just need to play once to understand. From next game, you will be ready to the challenge to get to the prohibitive level: level 9. At first sight, it does not look so hard, but to get to the last level you need to be rather crafty, then, after getting skilful, you will use game tactics that are more and more effective to break records. 


      more

UpUp is a frozen adventure. A platform game incredibly fun and addictive!!

In the game, you are an adventurer who need to run to reach the highest point of the mountain, facing snow and extreme cold. Time is your biggest enemy, you need to be quick to not freeze and die of cold. His agility is also important to face deadly and dangerous geysers and spikes.

UpUp offers an extremely simple mechanics, but very challenging. Besides having fun for hours, you can challenge your friends to see who will be the first to reach the highest point of the mountain.

STAY TUNED! UpUp is full of ACHIEVEMENTS to be unlocked. In addition, many other secrets are hidden, you just need to find them!

All the visual concept of the game was inspired by a charming Pixel Art and the game never repeats itself, due to dynamic blocks mountain. With each move a new mountain is designed, making the UpUp even more dynamic and challenging.

The game's soundtrack is amazing, as closer to the highest point of the mountain rhythmic and stronger it becomes.

FEATURES:

• UpUp it's FREE! You just need to download and enjoy!
• Languages: Portuguese and English
• Age rating: Free
• Ranking - challenge your friends and see who is the #1
• Achievements: numerous achievements to unlock and have fun!
• Face the extreme cold, deadly spikes, dangerous geysers and subterranean caves
• Collect crystals to improve their equipment and get faster to the mountaintop
• Routes only every move!
• Pixel Art charming
• Exciting music

Why did the ball fly into space?

Upventure is a beautiful fast paced game with colorful levels and cute characters.

How to play?
• Tap play icon to start.
• Slide horizontally (left-right) anywhere on the screen.
• Avoid the cube obstacles.
• Collect gems, if you can.

Features:
• One-finger control lets you play easily with one hand.
• Unique gameplay: Collectible gems behind obstacles.
• Starts off easy, gets challenging fast. Addicting gameplay.
• Zen-like music with sound effects, recorded with real instruments.
• Unlock famous and cute characters.

Tips:
• Use the area below the ball to see the upcoming obstacles.
• The ball moves right or left on a line, it doesn't follow your finger up and down.
• Resist the urge to push the character up as you go faster!

Jump up the walls and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard!

Upwards! is a 2D, minimalist game in which you walljump your way up. 

It is a fun and simple yet challenging journey upwards. Timing your jumps and doublejumps precisely is essential to avoiding the many obstacles on your way to reach newer heights. Tap once anywhere on the screen to jump into the direction your character is facing and twice for a doublejump. During your climb, you will be able to collect tons of gems which you can use to unlock beautiful, unique characters and colorful new themes to customize your experience. 

Let's see who can climb the highest! Onwards and upwards!

Do you love word searches, but you’ve been wanting to add a little excitement? Maybe you were hoping someone would add a modern spin on this timeless game. 
Well you’re in luck, because we were too! So we locked ourselves in a room, brainstormed for hours, then threw tradition out the window and changed it up a bit to create the next generation of word search games. 

We took the customary word search format that you have experienced on other word search apps, but we added a new twist to it for even more challenging word game fun! The UpWord Search app features dozens and dozens of wide ranging categories to provide you with endless hours of searching fun. We added varying levels of difficulty so you can start simple, build your confidence, then push yourself and see how good you really are. Don’t worry, the same old-fashioned rules you’re used to still apply - you can find words up, down, left, right, diagonal, and even backwards. However, you better be quick, because in THIS word search game everything scrolls continuously upward! 

Test your skills as you quickly scour the screen for hidden words and highlight them all before they disappear off the screen. Explore different game modes and unlock new categories as you hone your abilities. With thousands of words across heaps of categories, we think you’ll agree that UpWord Search is the newest game you’re going to be addicted to!

Download UpWord Search today and fall in love all over again with word searches!

Ultimate 3D parkeerplaats spel! 
De meest uitdagende parkeerplaats spel ter wereld is eindelijk hier, met meer dan honderd parkeerplaatsen puzzels / niveaus, gelegen in vier unieke 3D-omgevingen. Dit geweldige parkeerplaats rijsimulator spel zit vol met geweldige functies, die niet eerder zijn gezien in een game in dit genre. Vergeet de rijschool. Je zult echt leren om je auto te parkeren op de plek goed in Urban City Car Drive 3D. U leert hoe u geweldig en verschillende auto's rijden rond een parkeerplaats vol met obstakels, andere auto's, scherpe bochten en harde bochten.
vaardigheden zijn vereist, precisie drivers zullen worden uitgedaagd! 
Inderdaad, dit 3D driving game vereist kennis en geduld. Controleer uw stuur, schakelen tandwielen en zet de auto in natuurlijke nadat park op de perfecte parkeerplaats. Vermijd crashen in de vele voorwerpen op uw weg, geen krassen en breken in om het even wat, want als je dat doet wat je nodig hebt om opnieuw te beginnen. Daag niet alleen jezelf, maar ook je vrienden uit om je te verslaan, vergelijken de scores in de leaderboards en word de koning van de parkeerplaats. Zijn allen over de snelheid en nauwkeurigheid, het verzamelen van de sterren in de levels om een hogere score te krijgen. Als je crash in een hindernis is er een optie om de tijd terug te spoelen, zodat je niet hoeft om de hele level opnieuw te spelen. Hoe geweldig is dat !?
Voer de garage en het aanpassen van uw auto! 
Ja, er is niets mis met je ogen. Je kunt eigenlijk pas uw auto de manier waarop u dat wilt. Kies een van de 10 unieke auto's, kopen kleuren, getinte ruiten, geweldige stickers en zelfs de nummerplaat! Geef je auto een eigen look en feel met deze geweldige tuning opties, omdat iedereen wil een auto die zichzelf definieert (of op zijn minst een aantal van ons doen). Duik in de brede selectie van auto modificatie opties en het verbeteren van uw auto alleen de manier waarop u het wilt!
Een unieke parkeerplaats ervaring met een aantal unieke kenmerken: 
- 10 realistische en ontzagwekkende auto's om uit te kiezen
- 4 unieke gebieden met 25 parkeerplaatsen daagt elkaar!
- Hoge scores en achievements
- Verzamel sterren om een hogere score te halen
- Verander uw auto in uw eigen stijl (verf, stickers, wielen, velgen en getint glas)
- Meer auto's en meer parkeerplaatsen niveaus zal worden uitgebracht in de nabije toekomst
- Ga niveaus als ze hard
- Als je crash, sprong terug in de tijd en probeer het opnieuw met de tijd terugspoelen optie
- Open alle achievements
Dus voor al je auto rijden en parkeren game liefhebbers die er zijn: ga allemaal uit met Urban City Car Drive 3D. Het is de nieuwste en meest geweldige 3D-parking game-ervaring op android! Toon uw rijvaardigheid, het testen van de leiding, te controleren of de auto in de juiste versnelling, zorg ervoor dat je genoeg ruimte om de juiste bochten te maken en stel een perfecte score kreeg. Bent u klaar voor een aantal parkeerplaatsen plezier met de beste parking game van 2014? Dan installeren, opent u het spel en hebben een ultiem parkeerplaats plezier!
Urban City Car Drive 3D is een goed ontworpen parkeergarage spel gemaakt voor iedereen die graag het rijden en parkeren simulatoren. Laat ons weten wat je van dit spel, en een reactie achterlaten (of contacteer ons via e-mail). VascoGames is trots om u deze nieuwe titel brengen.

column5: Pretend play life in a city
column6: Break your daily routine, escape to a new city and create a whole new life in Urban City Stories where you will live unprecedented and exciting experiences. Amazing places to explore await you, full of secrets to discover and new neighbors to meet. Welcome to your very own city! Experience the freedom to play your way and with your rules in everyday life in a vibrant metropolis, where its captivating places will inspire your imagination to create the most unforgettable stories. Take charge of the day-to-day life of a family in their urban apartment, take care of replenishing the products of the supermarket, be the police chief, or a banker, would you like to escape to the youth club and organize an unforgettable party? Or would you rather become a superhero and save the whole city? You will have at your disposal the most fashionable clothing store, where you can experiment with dozens of different clothes, accessories and hairstyles. And because urban life is always better when you share it, show off your outfit with friends and family using the new camera feature, where you can capture the magical moments that occur in Urban City Stories. Features - Free play mode without specific pressures or objectives. Your city, your rules.- Locations full of characters and interactions: A huge city with police station, supermarket, bank, café, fashion store, metro station, apartment, traditional house and a youth club.- 30 different characters that you can customize as you want with different hairstyles and colors of hair and skin, and dozens of clothes and accessories such as hats and shoes so you can create thousands of different combinations.- New camera mode so you can save and share the best moments that happen in your stories.The free game includes the city streets, 2 indoor locations and 10 characters for you to play unlimited and try the possibilities of the game. Once you're sure, you'll be able to enjoy the full version with a unique purchase, which will unlock all locations and characters in the game forever.About PlayToddlers PlayToddlers games have been developed to be enjoyed by all members of the family, regardless of their age. We promote responsible social values and healthy habits in a safe and controlled environment without violence or advertisements from third parties.

# UNTYPICAL HORSE GAME
Take the reins! As the user of Urban Cowboiz you play a young Irish-Traveller, who is riding all across London with his horse and who is searching for attention.
In this endlessrunner game you try to convince the people of London with tricks on your horse.  

#INSANE HORSETRICKS     
Entertaining the people of London is not as easy as it seems, because they are constantly distracted. Your goal is to stage your skills as good as possible to gain a maximum of followers. How many followers can you get? Your pursuit of compliance is the driving force of the story. 

#SATIRICAL GAME 
Be the most popular person in the city! In Urban Cowboiz, the need for recognition and acceptance by the society can be experienced in an interactive manner. The user passes through mechanisms of recognition found in young urban culture. It is a showcase of special skills, all of them provoking the central question: When can you see me? Am I gonna be recognized? What should I do to achieve attention? And above all: When can I be satisfied - if I got 10 or 50,000 followers?

#CULTURE
serious game with humor.
In a satirical manner Urban Cowboys is tracing these questions. The answer delivered is as pompous as banal: As long as you stage something only for an audience, you’re going to be nothing more than a supernumerary in your own life. Likes and followers alone don’t provide satisfaction. On the contrary: Strategies of self-staging only confirm the staging itself. The question is, what authentic extent of a personal confirm can be drawn out of it?

The user switches into the role of Cowboi, a young Irish-Traveller. Their culture is defined by the appreciation of horses as one of their most important status symbols. The Irish Travellers - formerly travelling people - were urged to settle down at the outskirts of the Irish and English society, where there is no room for keeping horses. This culture is threatened by extinction and could become a folkloric relic in the foreseeable future. The culture of the Irish Travellers is authentic because the travellers do not have to stage for the purpose of external representation, but rather for internal tradition reasons.

The attention is not an end in itself. It’s not about how others will see me, it is rather about my self perception. This applies to the individual as well as the culture. This kind of self-perception is also characteristic for Irish Travellers.

#ARTWORK
Is it a magazine or a game? Show your Style! Urban Cowboys plays with elements of today’s pop and youth culture. It processes the aesthetics of contemporary music videos and works with the style of editorial photography.


#MUSIC
Ride with the Technobeat! The music focuses on the action and complements the visual of the pop cultural world in an auditive dimension. It is a mix of “Big Beat” and “Acid House”, which reflects the urban lifestyle.

Based on a project at the Filmakademie Baden-Wuerttemberg  www.interaktive-medien.animationsinstitut.de

Urban Illusions is an experimental interactive documentation based in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and the surrounding events that received national news coverage in July, 2016. The intent of this work is to document the artist’s real-life experiences and share them through a virtual lense to engage, educate, and inspire the viewer to have a more personal experience of their own. Could this be the start of how historical events and information are experienced in the near future? 

IMPORTANT: Only compatible with iPhone 5s and later

-This is not a game
-This is a digital art MFA thesis project
-Interactive 360 videos with clickable buttons

NOTICE: Some material may be sensitive to some audiences. Viewer discretion is advised. This artistic experiment, in the form of an app, is for educational purposes only. All documented footage was filmed by the artist with the intention to inform and educate the viewer through a new media format. 

DISCLAIMER: The views and opinions expressed are soley those of the original artist. The views and opinions do not necessarily represent those of Apple Inc., and/or any/all contributors to this platform.

"The truth is hidden"
Go on the most terrifying adventure with famous horror series Shin Hayarigami.
Be ready, because this story will make you shiver... 

Features:
- Shin Hayarigami: The BlindMan is a narrative masterpiece that will seriously creep you out once and for all. 
- The story will bring out your biggest fears and shake you to the ground.
- You can test your detective skills and shed light on the most terrifying murder case in history. 

How to play:
- Shin Hayarigami: The BlindMan is a visual novel horror game. Follow the story, listen and watch carefully. Pay attention to every single detail that can help you solve the case and uncover the mystery of the Urban Legend of the BlindMan. 
- From time to time you will have multiple choice questions. Your answers will define the future of the story and will affect the whole investigation. Think carefully before you choose an answer. Don't get trapped. 
- Use all your detective skills that can help you find crucial clues. Will you be able to overcome your fear and find the truth?
- Use your wits and logic to solve the case. Don't let your feelings and emotions get in the way.
- Shin Hayarigami: The BlindMan is more than just a story. It is part of breathtaking series of visual horror novels. While playing this game you will discover thrilling and terrifying stories. Be ready to shiver!
- You will be fascinated with the story, but in the real world, be prepared to crumble in fear as you hear the murderer whispering in your ear: "Give me your eyes..."
- Urban Legend: The BlindMan - the story is so disturbing and fascinating at the same time. This will be incredibly scary, even for you!

Prologue
A murder happened in an isolated village in the S prefecture. A body was found with its eyes carved out.
Someone came forward saying: "I have some information on the murder that happened in village C in prefecture S." 

This man, university professor Takeshi Sekimoto, was being tried at the Tokyo district court, and said to have information on this incident. So, he was transferred to a detention center of C village’s police department.

Sekimoto will be in the hands of the special police department in which our hero Hojyo Saki is stationed. Sekimoto was confident when he confirmed all the case material. He claims this murder is the work of the monster "BlindMan" from the Urban Legend.

With Shin Hayarigami: The BlindMan, start a journey in a terrific horror game, that will shake you to the core. Follow in the footsteps of the BlindMan, to crack this scary case and bring back peace to the city. Dive deep in this scary atmosphere tainted with suspense and fear and be ready to shiver. But be careful to not get trapped or you may be the next victim!

※ Contact information: 
E-Mail : help@iplayse.com
Twitter : urbanlegend(@Shin_Hayarigami)

[Brief Introduction]
Have you ever take risks in your real city?
New York, Tokyo, London, Paris, Anywhere.
Survival in the future world after economic crisis.
Make sure not get hurt by using all the resources around you.
Cut down trees, eat chicken, fight with a wild dog.
Even create fire by hand, make more advanced props

When you are hungry, just buy food in Supermarket.
When you are tired, just have a sleep in hospital.
When you are poor, just apply for a good salary.
When you are rich, just go to spend freely.


[Game Story]
The economic crisis in 4.4.2022
Almost all countries in the world have been affected.
Like 3 lost decades, countless people displaced.
The survivors of this age are alive for survival.
They called themselves as 'Urban Ranger'.

- Real Geographic Location: The birth and rebirth of Rangers are based on players'real GPS positioning.

Urban Wagon is a group game inspired by the Oregon Trail that allows you to meet new people.  Pioneer the modern social setting by completing randomized tasks that involve introducing yourself to strangers.  Each task is designed to reduce the initial awkwardness of a new interaction.

Players complete tasks to progress down the trail.  Skipping or failing too many tasks may result in a hardship imposed on a random player.  Hardships can reduce player morale or require them to sit out for a certain number of tasks.  In order to increase a player's morale, that player must complete a task.

Lighthearted, creative, and an ode to a legendary historical event and computer game, test out Urban Wagon and see how many connections you can make!

Drei Jäger, zwei Städte, ein Gewinner: Das innovative Mixed-Reality-Game von Mercedes-Benz kehrt zurück. Am 30. September 2016 um 19.00 Uhr rennen die Teilnehmenden durch die Strassen von Zürich und Lausanne, um dem Jäger zu entkommen – dem Mercedes-Benz GLC Coupé. Am Spielprinzip ändert sich nichts: Bleibe am längsten im Spiel und gewinne das neue Mercedes-Benz GLC Coupé.

DAS MIXED REALITY GAME IM DETAIL
Am Freitag, 30. September 2016, ist es soweit: Um 19.00 Uhr beginnt Urban. Hunt. zeitgleich in Lausanne und Zürich. Die Jagd dauert ca. zweieinhalb Stunden. Kurz nach dem Start, um ca. 19.15 Uhr, macht sich in jeder Stadt der erste Jäger auf die Pirsch. Weitere Jäger folgen im Verlauf des Spiels. Über GPS werden die Teilnehmenden ausfindig gemacht und verfolgt. Die Teilnehmenden entwischen den Jägern, indem sie sich zum Beispiel

- möglichst weit weg von ihnen aufhalten,
- in sogenannten «Safe Houses» verstecken,
- mit Power-ups unsichtbar machen
- oder mit Health Packs wieder zu zusätzlicher Lebensenergie kommen.

Mit speziellen Power-ups sabotiert man andere Teilnehmende oder den Jäger, was permanente Spannung ins Spiel bringt. 

Je länger die Jagd dauert, desto schwieriger wird es, sich nicht erwischen zu lassen: «Naturkatastrophen» machen bestimmte Gebiete plötzlich unpassierbar, Stürme ziehen durch die Städte und der Einflussbereich der Jäger wird immer grösser.

Die richtige Strategie, List und Glück zeichnen den Sieger aus. 

Es gilt das Spielprinzip «last man standing» (der letzte Übrigbleibende gewinnt): Hast du zum Spielende mehr Lebenspunkte als der „last man standing“ der anderen Stadt, gewinnst du das brandneue, progressive GLC Coupé. Als “unterlegener” Gewinner erhältst du eine IWC Pilot’s Watch Chronograph.

Zudem gibt es für die Ränge zwei bis zehn pro Stadt weitere attraktive Preise zu gewinnen.

SPIELE IM TEAM
Gründe in der App ein Team und lade bis zu neun Freunde dazu ein. Im Spiel siehst du so, wo sich deine Team-Mitglieder befinden und in der Teamübersicht, wie viel Lebensenergie sie noch haben oder wer bereits ausgeschieden ist. Als Team habt ihr noch weitere Vorteile: Loggen sich zum Spielstart alle zehn Mitglieder ein, erhalten alle das Power-Up “Falle” zum Start.

OPTIMALE VORBEREITUNG
Im Menupunkt “Spielvorbereitung” oder auf der Website erfährst du alles zur idealen Vorbereitung auf Urban. Hunt. Besonders empfehlenswert ist der Survival Guide, der dich über alle Funktionen des Spiels informiert und nützliche Tipps bereithält.

Mehr Informationen zum Spiel und den Events unter: http://www.urbanhunt.ch 

Teilnahmebedingungen.
http://www.urbanhunt.ch/de/disclaimer 


Hast du Fragen? Du erreichst uns über Twitter (@urbanhunt) oder per E-Mail (info@urbanhunt.ch).

Apple ist kein Sponsor und in keiner Art und Weise an den Wettbewerben oder Gewinnspielen der Urban. Hunt. App beteiligt. Die Mercedes-Benz Schweiz AG verwendet keine Apple-Produkte als Preise für ihre Wettbewerbe oder Gewinnspiele.

Bilde mit deinen Freunden ein oder zwei Teams und löst eine unserer URBANmissions. Die URBANmissions werden meistens in einem bestimmten Teil der Stadt gespielt. Da sie an einem relativ kleinen Gebiet stattfinden, fällt das lange Laufen oder Benutzung der ÖV zwischen den einzelnen Aufgaben weg. Das Spiel ist kompakt und verliert nicht an Spannung. 
Apropos Spannung: alle Spiele sind zeitlich begrenzt und müssen in der vorgegebenen Zeit gelöst werden! Die Spieldauer liegt in der Regel zwischen 60 und 90 Minuten.
Apropos zwei Teams: Die meisten URBANmissions kann man im Duell spielen. Welches Team wird als erstes alle Rätsel richtig lösen und gewinnen?

Was ist die URBANmission App?
Die URBANmission App ist eine mobile Plattform für interaktive Schnitzeljagd Spiele. Die URBANmissions können separat auf www.urbanmissions.ch gekauft werden.

Was ist das URBANmission Spiel?
Das URBANmission Spiel ist eine digitale interaktive Schnitzeljagt, die in einem Stadtteil oder auf einem begehbaren Gelände stattfindet. Dabei müssen knifflige Rätsel in einer vorgegebenen Zeit gelöst werden.

Warum URBANmission?
Mit unseren Spielen wirst du knifflige Rätsel lösen, geheime Botschaften und Zeichen entziffern, deinen Kombinationssinn auf die Probe stellen, um die Ecke denken, den Teamgeist steigern und viel Spass erleben. Jede URBANmission hat eine andere spannende Geschichte und passende Rätsel.
URBANmission verbindet eine digitale Umgebung auf deinem Smartphone oder Tablet mit der realen Welt. 

Wozu eignet sich URBANmission?
Mit URBANmission wirst du viele Rätsel lösen und dabei einen Stadtteil oder ein Gebiet entdecken. Einige Spiele enthalten Inhalte, die wissenschaftliche, historische oder andere edukative Informationen auf eine spielerische Art vermitteln. URBANmission Spiele, mit welchen du auf eine spielerische Art etwas dazu lernen kannst, werden entsprechend gekennzeichnet.

Wie funktioniert URBANmission?
Auf der Website www.urbanmissions.ch findest du alle unsere URBANmissions. Je nachdem, in welcher Stadt du dich gerade aufhältst, kannst du die passende Mission auswählen und hier in der App herunterladen. Danach steht dir nichts mehr im Weg, viel Spass!

WICHTIG: Die App funktioniert nur mit gekauften Spielen von URBANmission, welche nur am vorgegebenen Ort gespielt werden können. Die Spiele kannst du hier kaufen: www.urbanmissions.ch
